title: Spice container
description: lobed tower form with flag on top; birds at 4 corners of pinnacle base with bell below; floral decoration on widest lobe; grapes on tripod feet
provenance: (Antiques shop, Ben Yehuda Street, Jerusalem); Collection of Harold & Mickey Smith, St. Paul, Minnesota purchased 1980; Gift to the MIA in 2001.
creditline: Gift of Harold and Mickey Smith
